title: Foundations of Humanities Inquiry Using 3D Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool usage skills, general interest in humanities
context.additional_context: Conducted in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones, exploring literature and history concepts through game-based activities. Combines weekly offline meetings with mobile game assignments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given historical events/literary themes in 3D game environments with ≥80% accuracy
Explain ≥5 core humanities concepts (e.g., narrative structure, cultural context) through interactions in virtual worlds
Collaborate with peer learners to create knowledge artifacts through team-based game quests

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
